content: Is this a gmail or outlook.com account? Both services automatically copy sent mail to the Sent (outlook.com) or Sent Mail (gmail) folders, so 'Place a copy in' in Account Settings, Copies & Folders, should be unchecked.
creator: sfhowes

content: No calendar is defined as the default. Whichever calendar that is selected in the left pane of the calendar tab is the one that accepted invitations will be added to.
creator: sfhowes

content:
Unfortunately it don't work. I select the calendar I want to use, put it on top of the list. But when I accept an invitation it still ends up in the home. If I remove the home, it can not save it at all.

Is there something I'm missing?

Best regards /Mike
creator: micke1
